SELECT TB_AR01M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_AR01M01 ( CO_CD, REQ_DT, CLNT_CD, SHIP_SEQ, PRJCT_CD, WH_CD, TYP_CD, OWNER_CD, SALES_AREA_CD, MNG_TEL, DLVR_DTTM, DIRTRS_YN, DLVR_RMK, ADDR_ZIP, ADDR_MAIN, ADDR_SUB, SHIP_RMK, SHIP_TOT_QTY, SHIP_TOT_WT, SHIP_TOT_AMT, REAL_TOT_QTY, REAL_TOT_WT, REAL_TOT_AMT, TRANS_AMT, TRANS_SEQ, ODR_SEQ, ORDRG_SEQ, SALES_MNG, SALES_DEPT, SHIP_YN, ODR_CREAT_DIV, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM, SITE_CD, ALLOC_VEHL_NO, TAXIVC_COPRT, SHIP_CNT ) VALUES ( #{coCd}, #{reqDt}, #{clntCd}, #{shipSeq}, #{prjctCd}, #{whCd}, #{typCd}, #{ownerCd}, #{salesAreaCd}, #{mngTel}, #{dlvrDttm}, #{dirtrsYn}, #{dlvrRmk}, #{addrZip}, #{addrMain}, #{addrSub}, #{shipRmk}, #{shipTotQty}, #{shipTotWt}, #{shipTotAmt}, #{realTotQty}, #{realTotWt}, #{realTotAmt}, #{transAmt}, #{transSeq}, #{odrSeq}, #{ordrgSeq}, #{salesMng}, (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = #{salesMng}), 'N', NVL(#{odrCreatDiv},'ERP'), #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{siteCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allocVehlNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxivcCoprt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{shipCnt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},1) )

SELECT TB_AR01D01_SQ01.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_AR01D01 ( SHIP_SEQ, SHIP_DTL_SEQ, PRDT_CD, PRDT_UNIT, PRDT_LEN, SHIP_QTY, SHIP_WT, BD_CNT, SHIP_UPR, SHIP_AMT, PCHS_UPR, SELL_UPR, STOCK_UPR, PRDT_UPR, SHIP_YN, SHIP_PROC_ID, SHIP_DTTM, REAL_SHIP_QTY, REAL_SHIP_WT, REAL_SHIP_UPR, REAL_SHIP_AMT, SHIP_VEH_NO, SHIP_DTL_RMK, ORDRG_DTL_SEQ, ODR_DTL_SEQ, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_SPEC, IMP_YN, MAKR_CD ) VALUES ( #{shipSeq}, #{shipDtlSeq}, #{prdtCd}, #{prdtUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prdtLen, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipQty}, #{shipWt}, #{bdCnt}, #{shipUpr}, #{shipAmt}, #{pchsUpr}, #{sellUpr}, #{stockUpr}, #{prdtUpr}, 'N', #{shipProcId}, #{shipDttm}, #{realShipQty}, #{realShipWt}, #{realShipUpr}, #{realShipAmt}, #{shipVehNo}, #{shipDtlRmk}, #{ordrgDtlSeq}, #{odrDtlSeq}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{prdtSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prdtSpec, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impYn}, #{makrCd} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_AR01D01 WHERE SHIP_SEQ = #{shipSeq} AND SHIP_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT T.CO_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.CO_CD) AS CO_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.REQ_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DT, T.CLNT_CD, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_NM, T.SHIP_SEQ, T.PRJCT_CD, (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = T.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, T.WH_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.WH_CD) AS WH_NM, T.TYP_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.TYP_CD) AS TYP_NM, T.OWNER_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.OWNER_CD) AS OWNER_NM, T.SALES_AREA_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.SALES_AREA_CD) AS SALES_AREA_NM, T.MNG_TEL, TO_CHAR(T.DLVR_DTTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DLVR_DTTM, T.DIRTRS_YN, T.DLVR_RMK, T.ADDR_ZIP, T.ADDR_MAIN, T.ADDR_SUB, T.SHIP_RMK, T.SHIP_TOT_QTY, T.SHIP_TOT_WT, T.SHIP_TOT_AMT, T.REAL_TOT_QTY, T.REAL_TOT_WT, T.REAL_TOT_AMT, T.TRANS_AMT, T.TRANS_SEQ, T.ODR_SEQ, T.ORDRG_SEQ, T.SALES_MNG, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.SALES_MNG) AS SALES_MNG_NM, T.SHIP_YN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AR01D01 WHERE SHIP_SEQ = T.SHIP_SEQ AND SHIP_YN = 'Y') AS CONFIRM_CNT, T.SHIP_PROC_ID, TO_CHAR(T.SHIP_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SHIP_DTTM, T.ODR_CREAT_DIV, T.ETC_FIELD1, T.ETC_FIELD2, T.ETC_FIELD3, T.CREAT_ID, T.CREAT_PGM, T.CREAT_DTTM, T.UDT_ID, T.UDT_PGM, T.UDT_DTTM, (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.WH_CD)) AS WH_CLNT_CD, (SELECT CODE_RPRC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.WH_CD) AS WH_TYPE, T.SITE_CD, (SELECT SITE_NM FROM TB_SD09M01 WHERE SITE_CD = T.SITE_CD) AS SITE_NM, T.ALLOC_VEHL_NO, T.TAXIVC_COPRT, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.TAXIVC_COPRT) AS TAXIVC_COPRT_NM, T.RECPT_YN, T.SHIP_CNT FROM TB_AR01M01 T WHERE SHIP_SEQ = #{shipSeq}

SELECT T.ODR_SEQ, T.CO_CD, T.TYP_CD, T.DIRTRS_YN, T.CLNT_CD, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_NM, T.OWNER_CD, T.SALES_MNG, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.SALES_MNG) AS SALES_MNG_NM, T.MAKR_CD, T.WH_CD, T.TAXIVC_COPRT, T.IMP_YN, T.SITE_CD, (SELECT SITE_NM FROM TB_SD09M01 WHERE SITE_CD = T.SITE_CD) AS SITE_NM, T.PRJCT_CD, (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = T.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, T.REQ_DT, TO_CHAR(T.DLVR_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DLVR_DTTM, T.ADDR_ZIP, T.ADDR_MAIN, T.ADDR_SUB, T.MNG_TEL, T.ODR_RMK AS DLVR_RMK, T.TOT_QTY AS SHIP_TOT_QTY, T.TOT_WT AS SHIP_TOT_WT, T.TOT_AMT AS SHIP_TOT_AMT, T.ODR_CREAT_DIV FROM TB_SD04M01 T WHERE ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq}

SELECT T.SHIP_SEQ, T.SHIP_DTL_SEQ, T.PRDT_CD, B.PRDT_NM, T.PRDT_UNIT, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_UNIT) AS PRDT_UNIT_NM, T.PRDT_LEN, T.PRDT_SPEC, T.PRDT_SIZE, T.SHIP_QTY, T.SHIP_WT, T.BD_CNT, T.SHIP_UPR, DECODE( M.PRJCT_CD, 0, DECODE(B.PRDT_STOCK_CD, 'N', 0, NVL(FN_SD06_UPR_FROM_PRDT_CD(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'SELPCH2', 'N', T.PRDT_CD, M.CLNT_CD, ''), 0)), DECODE(B.PRDT_STOCK_CD, 'N', 0, NVL(FN_SD06_UPR_FROM_PRDT_CD(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'SELPCH2', 'N', T.PRDT_CD, M.CLNT_CD, M.PRJCT_CD), 0)) ) AS SHIP_UPR_D, DECODE( M.PRJCT_CD, 0, DECODE(B.PRDT_STOCK_CD, 'N', 0, NVL(FN_SD06_UPR_FROM_PRDT_CD(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'SELPCH2', 'Y', T.PRDT_CD, M.CLNT_CD, ''), 0)), DECODE(B.PRDT_STOCK_CD, 'N', 0, NVL(FN_SD06_UPR_FROM_PRDT_CD(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'SELPCH2', 'Y', T.PRDT_CD, M.CLNT_CD, M.PRJCT_CD), 0)) ) AS SHIP_UPR_I, T.SHIP_AMT,
(T.SHIP_UPR * T.SHIP_QTY - T.STOCK_UPR * T.SHIP_QTY) AS EPCT_PAL, T.PCHS_UPR, T.SELL_UPR, T.STOCK_UPR, T.PRDT_UPR, T.CELL_CERTI_NO, T.SHIP_YN, T.SHIP_PROC_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.SHIP_PROC_ID) AS SHIP_PROC_NM, TO_CHAR(T.SHIP_DTTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS SHIP_DTTM, T.REAL_SHIP_QTY, T.REAL_SHIP_WT, T.REAL_SHIP_UPR, T.REAL_SHIP_AMT, T.SHIP_VEH_NO, T.SHIP_DTL_RMK, T.ORDRG_DTL_SEQ, T.ODR_DTL_SEQ, T.IMP_YN, T.MAKR_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.MAKR_CD) AS MAKR_NM, T.ETC_FIELD1, T.ETC_FIELD2, T.ETC_FIELD3, T.CREAT_ID, T.CREAT_PGM, T.CREAT_DTTM, T.UDT_ID, T.UDT_PGM, T.UDT_DTTM, B.PRDT_DIV, B.PRDT_STKN, B.PRDT_STOCK_CD, B.PRDT_COIL_YN, B.PRDT_CNVRSN_WT, B.PRDT_DT FROM TB_AR01D01 T INNER JOIN TB_AR01M01 M ON T.SHIP_SEQ = M.SHIP_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_BM01M01 B ON B.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD WHERE T.SHIP_SEQ = #{shipSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AR01M01 SET CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}, PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}, WH_CD = #{whCd}, TYP_CD = #{typCd}, OWNER_CD = #{ownerCd}, SALES_AREA_CD = #{salesAreaCd}, MNG_TEL = #{mngTel}, DIRTRS_YN = #{dirtrsYn}, DLVR_DTTM = #{dlvrDttm}, DLVR_RMK = #{dlvrRmk}, ADDR_ZIP = #{addrZip}, ADDR_MAIN = #{addrMain}, ADDR_SUB = #{addrSub}, SHIP_RMK = #{shipRmk}, SHIP_TOT_QTY = #{shipTotQty}, SHIP_TOT_WT = #{shipTotWt}, SHIP_TOT_AMT = #{shipTotAmt}, REAL_TOT_QTY = #{realTotQty}, REAL_TOT_WT = #{realTotWt}, REAL_TOT_AMT = #{realTotAmt}, TRANS_AMT = #{transAmt}, TRANS_SEQ = #{transSeq}, SALES_MNG = #{salesMng}, SALES_DEPT = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = #{salesMng}), UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE, ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq}, ORDRG_SEQ = #{ordrgSeq}, SITE_CD = #{siteCd}, TAXIVC_COPRT = #{taxivcCoprt}, SHIP_CNT = #{shipCnt} WHERE SHIP_SEQ = #{shipSeq}

UPDATE TB_AR01D01 T SET SHIP_YN = 'Y', SHIP_PROC_ID = #{shipProcId}, SHIP_DTTM = SYSDATE, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE SHIP_SEQ = #{shipSeq} AND SHIP_DTL_SEQ = #{shipDtlSeq}
